How to Play?

Brave Warrior, here are the basic rules:

First, you must double-tap the screen to start the game.

⚔️ Controls (2 Characters, 1 Screen)

• The Screen is Divided in Two:
		• Left Side: Controls the left character.
		• Right Side: Controls the right character.

🏃 Movements

• Jump: Double-Tap your side (tap twice quickly). Jump over obstacles!
• Dash/Slide: Single-Tap your side (tap once).

💥 Attack and Defense 🛡️

• Attack (Throw Obstacle!):
		• Single-Tap your side to throw the BOX/OBJECT in front of you. Aim at your opponent!
• Defense (Shield):
		• Activate the shield by Pressing and Holding your side in times of danger.
		• The shield deactivates when you release your finger. Watch your timing!

🎯 Game Objective

• Survive: Watch out for obstacles and your opponent's attacks!
• Lives: Each character has 3 lives. The game ends when lives run out!
• Hinder Your Opponent: Throw obstacles at your opponent or make them hit obstacles.
• High Score: Survive the longest and get the highest score!

✨ Tips

• Timing: Critical for jumping, attacking, and shielding!
• Focus: Pay attention to your character and your opponent.
• Pause: For a break, tap the Pause (||) button at the top center; to continue, tap the Play (▶) button.

If you're ready, let's begin! Good luck!
